attributes.action: Disallow The application for parole from Peter Sutcliffe & not allow further applications at the tax payers expence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the very nature of this mans crimes & the amount of crimes against women he committed, this man should never be free, the women named below have a right to justice, if this man is allowed to be freed, justice would not have been served

Wilma McCann
Emily Jackson
Irene Richardson
Patricia Atkinson
Jayne MacDonald
Jean Jordan
Yvonne Pearson
Helen Rytka
Vera Millward
Josephine Whitaker
Barbara Leach
Marguerite Walls
Jacqueline Hill

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
